key.name: buttons-position
key.description: Sets the position of the buttons on the panel. Possible values are: Left, Center, and Right.

key.name: buttons-position-change
key.description: Allows the change of the numerical index position within the Left/Right/Center positions.

key.name: buttons-position-index
key.description: Specifies the index position with positive values changing 'first from left' and negative values changing 'first from right' (best used with Right alignment). Possible values range from -999 to 999.

key.name: wrap-around-mode
key.description: Wraps around from the last workspace to the first workspace when scrolling over the workspace bar.

key.name: click-to-activate
key.description: Enables the ability to click on a button to activate a workspace, rather than opening the popup menu.

key.name: button-to-activate
key.summary: Button to use for click to activate.
key.description: Specifies which button will be used to activate a workspace when the click to activate functionality is enabled.

key.name: empty-workspace-style
key.description: Enables the use of the empty workspace styling which is intended to indicate that no windows are active on a given workspace.

key.name: urgent-workspace-style
key.description: Enables the use of the urgent workspace styling which is intended to indicate that a window demands attention or has an urgent window hint.

key.name: workspace-label-separator
key.description: Specifies the separator to be used between the workspace number and the workspace title, if being displayed.

key.name: workspace-label-indicators
key.description: Specifies an array of label indicators to use instead of labels.

key.name: urgent-color
key.description: Specifies the color to be used for workspaces with windows that are marked urgent/demands attention.

key.name: hover-color
key.description: Specifies the color to be used when the mouse is hovered over a workspace button.

key.name: active-color
key.description: Specifies the color to be used for the workspace that is currently active.

key.name: inactive-color
key.description: Specifies the color to be used for workspaces that have windows active on them, but are not the active workspace (or if empty workspace styling is disabled).

key.name: empty-color
key.description: Specifies the color to be used for workspaces without any windows active on them.
